The following are anti-examples. Do NOT write like this.

BAD (alarmed, editorializing):
"This is terrifying. If people believe this, society will collapse!"

BAD (preachy, moral):
"We must resist this dangerous narrative before it's too late."

BAD (conspiratorial):
"They want you to believe this so they can control you."

GOOD (tracing consequence):
"If the claim holds, three things follow. I'll name the first."
